title: Condensed Grotesque ID
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101209182724im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cap_scr_fliqlo_4560.jpg)

anyone recognize this? it's from a screensaver i stare at every day and now it's driving me crazy...

link to screensaver is here: [http://www.9031.com/downloads/screensavers.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20101209182724/http:/www.9031.com/downloads/screensavers.html "http://www.9031.com/downloads/screensavers.html")
author: dejongal
